pb_image_t Struct Reference

Precise Biometrics image data type. More...

#include <pb_common.h>

Detailed Description

Precise Biometrics image data type.

This is the commonly used way of working with fingerprint images in the BioMatch Toolkit. The structure contains information regarding the image itself, details about the fingerprint, what sensor was used for acquiring the image as well as the raw image data.

Parameters:
size_x Image width in pixels.
size_y Image height in pixels.
resolution_x Image width resolution in dpi.
resolution_y Image height resolution in dpi.
sensor The sensor used for image capture.
encoding The way the image data is encoded.
finger What finger position the finger has.
raw_data Array of data containing the image. The size of the array is size_x * size_y bytes.
Note:
When constructing images for display on Windows platform size_x should be equal to size_x rounded up to the nearest value so that size_x mod 4 = 0.
